item.title: WhatsApp to launch third-party chat integration in Europe soon
item.description: Users in Europe who have opted in to the third-party integration will be able to share messages, images, voice messages, videos and files.

item.title: Pine Labs gets warm market welcome on $440M India IPO despite a valuation trim
item.description: Pine Labs, backed by PayPal and Mastercard, gained 14% on its market debut.
